name: insipidly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that does not have a strong taste or character, or lacks interest or energy: It is an insipidly innocuous film. I find most supermarket produce is hard, dry, and insipidly tasteless. See
insipid
More examplesFewer examplesThe designers rambled insipidly about form and function.I think his poetry is insipidly sentimental.The portrayal of Snow White was insipidly sweet.
